includedAssets.title: Night Zero
includedAssets.synopsis: A mysterious virus arrives in New York in the first episode of the chilling horror series created by Guillermo del Toro.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A mysterious virus arrives in New York in the first episode of the chilling horror series created by Guillermo del Toro.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A mysterious virus arrives in New York in the first episode of the chilling horror series created by Guillermo del Toro.

includedAssets.title: The Box
includedAssets.synopsis: While Eph investigates the cause of the virus, one of the survivors develops a thirst for blood.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Eph investigates the cause of the virus, one of the survivors develops a thirst for blood.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Eph investigates the cause of the virus, one of the survivors develops a thirst for blood.

includedAssets.title: Gone Smooth
includedAssets.synopsis: As the survivors continue to deteriorate, Redfern is quarantined. Meanwhile, Eph tries to find out what happened to Emma.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the survivors continue to deteriorate, Redfern is quarantined. Meanwhile, Eph tries to find out what happened to Emma.

includedAssets.title: It's Not For Everybody
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep4 - It's Not For Everybody
includedAssets.synopsis: Jim makes a confession, Eldritch Palmer hires a hacker to bring down the city's communications systems and Ansel's wife is confronted with his disease.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jim makes a confession. Eldritch Palmer hires a hacker to bring down the city's communications systems. Ansel's wife is confronted with his disease.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jim makes a confession, Eldritch Palmer hires a hacker to bring down the city's communications systems and Ansel's wife is confronted with his disease.

includedAssets.title: Runaways
includedAssets.synopsis: Eph joins forces with Abraham, while exterminator Vasiliy heads to the sewers tracking rats that have been exhibiting strange behaviour.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Eph joins forces with Abraham, while exterminator Vasiliy heads to the sewers tracking rats that have been exhibiting strange behaviour.

includedAssets.title: Occultation
includedAssets.synopsis: Eph is arrested by the FBI, while the eclipse reveals the true extent of the vampire plague.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Eph is arrested by the FBI, while the eclipse reveals the true extent of the vampire plague.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Eph is arrested by the FBI, while the eclipse reveals the true extent of the vampire plague.

includedAssets.title: For Services Rendered
includedAssets.synopsis: Jim helps Abraham, Eph and Nora in a plan to track down the Master, while Neeva tries to protect Joan's children.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jim helps Abraham, Eph and Nora in a plan to track down the Master, while Neeva tries to protect Joan's children.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jim helps Abraham, Eph and Nora in a plan to track down the Master, while Neeva tries to protect Joan's children.

includedAssets.title: Creatures of the Night
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep8 - Creatures of the Night
includedAssets.synopsis: After learning that UV lamps could be a powerful defence against the vampires, the group take refuge in a convenience store as they come under attack.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After learning that UV lamps could be a powerful defence against the vampires, the group take refuge in a convenience store as they come under attack.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: After learning that UV lamps could be a powerful defence against the vampires, the group take refuge in a convenience store as they come under attack.

includedAssets.title: The Disappeared
includedAssets.synopsis: Eph returns home to protect his family, only to learn he may be too late. Meanwhile, Dutch tells Abraham about her dealings with The Master.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Eph returns home to protect his family, only to learn he may be too late. Meanwhile, Dutch tells Abraham about her dealings with The Master.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Eph returns home to protect his family, only to learn he may be too late. Meanwhile, Dutch tells Abraham about her dealings with The Master.

includedAssets.title: Loved Ones
includedAssets.synopsis: Eph embarks on a traumatic search for Kelly, while Dutch and Vasiliy team up to repair the damage to the city's internet network.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Eph embarks on a traumatic search for Kelly, while Dutch and Vasiliy team up to repair the damage to the city's internet network.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Eph embarks on a traumatic search for Kelly, while Dutch and Vasiliy team up to repair the damage to the city's internet network.

includedAssets.title: The Third Rail
includedAssets.synopsis: Eph must leave Zack at the pawn shop with Mariela, as he and the gang go beneath the World Trade Center to find The Master.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Eph must leave Zack at the pawn shop with Mariela, as he and the gang go beneath the World Trade Center to find The Master.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Eph must leave Zack at the pawn shop with Mariela, as he and the gang go beneath the World Trade Center to find The Master.

includedAssets.title: Last Rites
includedAssets.synopsis: Dutch devises a plan to broadcast Eph's warning about the plague, but their victory is short-lived when Gabriel and Eichhorst launch an attack on the pawn shop.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Dutch devises a plan to broadcast Eph's warning about the plague, while Gabriel and Eichhorst launch an attack on the pawn shop.

includedAssets.title: The Master
includedAssets.synopsis: In the season finale, Abraham leads the group in an all-out attack on The Master.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: A crack team of scientists battle a mysterious outbreak in this slick sci-fi-horror series from executive producer Guillermo del Toro (Crimson Peak, Pan's Labyrinth). Corey Stoll stars.
